content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an AI response recommending the 'list_files' command to retrieve a list of all the files in the current directory. I ran the 'list_files' command and my computer returned a list of file names in the current directory. Another AI response suggested the 'google' command to search for information on a topic, and my computer returned a list of URLs related to the topic. I ran the 'execute_python_code' command with the argument 'code': "print('Hello, World!')", and my computer returned the message "Hello, World!" as an action result. An AI response recommended the 'write_to_file' command with the argument 'filename': "new_file.txt" and 'text': "This is some text to write to the new file." I ran the command and my computer returned the message "File written to successfully." as an action result. The latest development shows an AI message recommending the 'read_file' command with the argument 'filename': "new_file.txt", and my computer returned the message "This is some text to write to the new file." as an action result. Additionally, there was an AI response suggesting the 'append_to_file' command with the argument 'filename': "new_file.txt" and 'text': "\\nThis is some additional text to add to the file." I ran the command and my computer returned the message "Text appended successfully." as an action result.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "old_text": "some additional", "new_text": "some new", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: File /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/new_file.txt updated successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
